column4: I'm still having a problem getting Ubuntu to set my monitor to 60Hz refresh rate.  All that is available is 50 and 51...  I've already reconfigured xserver-xorg.  Any other ideas?
its a bug in the binary of the drivers, it scrambles the refresh info
I've been able to get it working in the past.... just can't remember how :(.  I'll be writing down my solution this time.
well, let me know if you find, I have the same problem myself, and thats what I was told
